channel.title: Docs on RHElements
channel.description: Recent content in Docs on RHElements

item.title: Browser Support | RHElements
item.description: Browser Support RHElements are built on top of the Custom Elements v1 spec. As a result, with the help of the web components polyfill, we can support all major browsers and go all the way back to IE 11. Chrome Firefox Safari Edge IE 11 ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Written in ES6 To make sure we’re future-proof, RHElements are written in ES6.
